subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Sylvia Fowles scored 13 of her 23 points in the third quarter and the United States national team beat the W.N.B.A.  All-Stars, 99-72, on Saturday.
snippet: Sylvia Fowles scored 13 of her 23 points in the third quarter and the United States national team beat the W.N.B.A.  All-Stars, 99-72, on Saturday.
